title: Social Security Trust Funds Management Act of 1999
content: Amends SSA title XI to modify the required contents of social security account statements, including changes requiring such statements to contain information on the name, age, gender, mailing address, and marital status of the eligible individual, as well as additional specified new contents. Revises provisions on the mandatory provision of such statements, with changes to incorporate the Internet as a means of provision as soon as the Commissioner of Social Security determines that adequate confidentiality safeguards are in place. Replaces each reference to the Secretary with the Commissioner of Social Security each place such reference occurs in SSA title XI provisions on social security account statements.
